fragments.name: Echo Amplifier
fragments.description: Cards played in descending cost order deal +30% damage on the final card.
fragments.lore: A fragment of reversed time. It rewards those who unravel from complexity to simplicity.

fragments.name: Lethal Siphon
fragments.description: Attacks that deal exactly lethal damage refund 1 Energy.
fragments.lore: The void savors precision. Excess is wasteful; exactness is art.

fragments.name: Chain Resonance
fragments.description: Chain multiplier starts at x1.2 instead of x1.0.
fragments.lore: Resonance is the void's native tongue. Every repetition strengthens the signal.

fragments.name: Type Bleed
fragments.description: Skill cards continue Attack chains (do not break the chain).
fragments.lore: In the void, categories dissolve. Defense becomes offense becomes void.

fragments.name: Suffering Echo
fragments.description: Whenever you take damage, your next Attack deals +3 damage.
fragments.lore: Pain echoes outward. The void ensures nothing is wasted.

fragments.name: Overkill Cascade
fragments.description: Excess damage from a killing blow splashes to a random enemy.
fragments.lore: The void abhors a vacuum. Energy must flow somewhere.

fragments.name: Entropy Tax
fragments.description: The first card you play each turn costs 0 Energy, but the last card costs +1.
fragments.lore: Entropy is a tax on existence. The void merely collects what is owed.

fragments.name: Mirror Intent
fragments.description: When an enemy buffs itself, you gain 2 Block.
fragments.lore: The void mirrors everything. Intent reflects intent.

fragments.name: Corruption Feast
fragments.description: Corrupted cards deal +50% damage but gain +2 corruption per play.
fragments.lore: Feed the void and the void feeds you. A fair trade, it whispers.

fragments.name: Temporal Stutter
fragments.description: Every 4th card played each combat is played twice.
fragments.lore: Time stutters in the void's grip. Every fourth heartbeat echoes.

fragments.name: Glass Cannon
fragments.description: All damage dealt +25%. All damage received +25%.
fragments.lore: The void strips away armor and pretense alike.

fragments.name: Discard Harvest
fragments.description: Whenever you discard a card at end of turn, gain 1 Block per card discarded.
fragments.lore: Nothing is wasted in the void. Even what you throw away returns.

fragments.name: Void Sight
fragments.description: See the top card of your draw pile at all times.
fragments.lore: The void sees through the deck as through glass.

fragments.name: Hungry Void
fragments.description: Cards that cost 0 deal +4 damage. Cards that cost 3+ gain +4 Block.
fragments.lore: The void hungers for extremes. Moderation is invisible to it.

fragments.name: Death Rattle
fragments.description: When an enemy dies, all other enemies lose 3 Block.
fragments.lore: Death rattles through the void, weakening all who hear it.

fragments.name: Paradox Engine
fragments.description: If you play exactly 5 cards in a turn, draw 2 cards at start of next turn.
fragments.lore: Five is the number of the seals. Five is the shape of collapse.
